TextBlock.Text: BILLY: This moon looks like Wher. Why does it look like Wher..?
WESTON: I have no clue, but as with everything, we should probably explore some stuff. Maybe mine up the contents of this moon for metal.
KATHERYNE: Hey, you guys see that moon of that planet there?
KATHERYNE: The one with the lava orbiting that gas giant lookin' thing.
BILLY AND WESTON: Oh yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah
KATHERYNE: We should go back to Wher and report to the others about it. Maybe that moon is rich in metal, considering it has lava.
BILLY: Great thinking, Katheryne! We need to return to Wher immediately.
